text: "Check It Out" is a 1988 song by John Mellencamp and is the third single from his ninth studio album The Lonesome Jubilee. It went to number 10 in Canada, number 14 in the United States, number 18 in New Zealand and number 22 in Australia. ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:John Mellencamp songs Category:Heartland rock songs
title: Check It Out (John Mellencamp song)
